name: Hanoi Motorbike Tour to Sapa, Ha Giang - 8 Days / 7 Nights
description: Let’s enjoy the beauties of mountainous northwestern Vietnam with us in this motorcycle tour while we riding on wonderful and spectacular routes such as Khau Pha pass, O Quy Ho pass. Gaze with veneration at the fanciful terraced rice fields in Mu Cang Chai or Than Uyen. Prior to Ha Giang attractive destinations, we also explore the different tourist attractions: Sapa and Bac Ha. Besides, we also have the opportunity to Ba Be National Park to explore the wild beauty of nature here.
